name: Catch of the Day
text:
[ Skill activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
[ Effect ]
Once per Duel, if you control "The Legendary Fisherman", you can activate "Umi" directly from your Deck or GY. Once per turn, at the end of your Battle Phase, if "The Legendary Fisherman" you control destroyed a monster by by battle or inflicted battle damage to your opponent this turn, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower WATER monster from your Deck or GY in Defense Position.
